snippet.title: Stronghold 2: Steam Edition - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Out Now - http://store.steampowered.com/app/40960/

Stronghold 2: Steam Edition comes packed with Steam multiplayer support, enhanced visuals, achievements, a new map pack, digital art book, full soundtrack and Steam trading cards. The Steam Edition also updates Stronghold 2 with full Steam Workshop integration, allowing to you easily create and share custom maps with friends. Recreate iconic real-life castles, battlegrounds from medieval history and scenes from your favourite fantasy epic! Stronghold 2: Steam Edition is a free update for all existing owners of Stronghold 2 on Steam.

Stronghold 2 allows players to experience true ‘castle life’ gameplay in this new reforged Steam Edition! Entertain your subjects or rule with an iron fist, dispensing medieval justice to overworked and malnourished peasants. With powerful barons jostling for power over a disintegrating kingdom, it is up to you to stem the tides of ambition and unite the land under the one true King! Featuring intricate feudal economy, siege warfare, crime and punishment systems and classic medieval events, this highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Stronghold comes packed with new additions to classic Stronghold gameplay.

Building on the sim gameplay of the original Stronghold, Stronghold 2 allows players to rule as they please and still conquer each skirmish. Unhappy peasants turn to crime and must be punished, rival lords can raise entire armies on their title alone and sieges must be fought tooth and nail, with close combat taking place inside castle structures! Stronghold 2: Steam Edition extends this gameplay to competitive multiplayer for up to eight players over Steam, with offline skirmish mode also available against computer-controller opponents.
